Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

9 namespace Kassiopeia
10 {
11 
12  //0 is time
13  //1 is length
14  //2 is x component of position
15  //3 is y component of position
16  //4 is z component of position
17  //5 is x component of momentum
18  //6 is y component of momentum
19  //7 is z component of momentum
20  //8 is B-aligned component of spin
21  //9 is B-perp angle of spin
22 
23  KSMagneticField* KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::fMagneticFieldCalculator = NULL;
24  KSElectricField* KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::fElectricFieldCalculator = NULL;
25  double KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::fMass = 0.;
26  double KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::fCharge = 0.;
27  double KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::fSpinMagnitude = 0.;
28  double KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::fGyromagneticRatio = 0.;

30  KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle() :
31  fTime( 0. ),
32  fLength( 0. ),
33  fPosition( 0., 0., 0. ),
34  fMomentum( 0., 0., 0. ),
35  fVelocity( 0., 0., 0. ),
36  fLorentzFactor( 0. ),
37  fKineticEnergy( 0. ),
38 
39  fMagneticField( 0., 0., 0. ),
40  fElectricField( 0., 0., 0. ),
41  fMagneticGradient( 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0. ),
42  fElectricGradient( 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0. ),
43  fElectricPotential( 0. ),
44 
45  fGuidingCenter( 0., 0., 0. ),
46  fLongMomentum( 0. ),
47  fTransMomentum( 0. ),
48  fLongVelocity( 0. ),
49  fTransVelocity( 0. ),
50  fCyclotronFrequency( 0. ),
51  fOrbitalMagneticMoment( 0. ),
52 
53  fAlignedSpin( 0. ),
54  fSpinAngle( 0. ),
55 
56  fGetMagneticFieldPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticField ),
57  fGetElectricFieldPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricField ),
58  fGetMagneticGradientPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient ),
59  fGetElectricPotentialPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential ),
60  fGetElectricGradientPtr( &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricGradient )
61  {
62  }
63  KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::~KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle()
64  {
65  }

70 
71  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::PullFrom( const KSParticle& aParticle )
72  {
73  //trajmsg_debug( "AdiabaticSpin particle pulling from particle:" << ret )
74 
75  if( fMagneticFieldCalculator != aParticle.GetMagneticFieldCalculator() )
76  {
77  //trajmsg_debug( " magnetic calculator differs" << ret )
78  fMagneticFieldCalculator = aParticle.GetMagneticFieldCalculator();
79 
80  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticField;
81  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient;
82  }
83 
84  if( fElectricFieldCalculator != aParticle.GetElectricFieldCalculator() )
85  {
86  //trajmsg_debug( " electric calculator differs" << ret )
87  fElectricFieldCalculator = aParticle.GetElectricFieldCalculator();
88 
89  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricField;
90  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential;
91  fGetElectricGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricGradient;
92  }
93 
94  if( GetMass() != aParticle.GetMass() )
95  {
96  //trajmsg_debug( " mass differs" << ret )
97  fMass = aParticle.GetMass();
98  }
99 
100  if( GetCharge() != aParticle.GetCharge() )
101  {
102  //trajmsg_debug( " charge differs" << ret )
103  fCharge = aParticle.GetCharge();
104  }
105 
106  if( GetSpinMagnitude() != aParticle.GetSpinMagnitude() )
107  {
108  //trajmsg_debug( " charge differs" << ret )
109  fSpinMagnitude = aParticle.GetSpinMagnitude();
110  }
111  if( GetGyromagneticRatio() != aParticle.GetGyromagneticRatio() )
112  {
113  //trajmsg_debug( " charge differs" << ret )
114  fGyromagneticRatio = aParticle.GetGyromagneticRatio();
115  }
116 
117  if( GetTime() != aParticle.GetTime() || GetPosition() != aParticle.GetPosition() )
118  {
119  //trajmsg_debug( " time or position differs" << ret )
120 
121  fTime = aParticle.GetTime();
122  fLength = aParticle.GetLength();
123  fPosition = aParticle.GetPosition();
124 
125  fData[ 0 ] = fTime;
126  fData[ 1 ] = fLength;
127  fData[ 2 ] = fPosition.X();
128  fData[ 3 ] = fPosition.Y();
129  fData[ 4 ] = fPosition.Z();
130 
131  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticField;
132  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricField;
133  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient;
134  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential;
135  fGetElectricGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricGradient;
136  }
137 
138  if( GetMomentum() != aParticle.GetMomentum() )
139  {
140  //trajmsg_debug( " momentum differs" << ret )
141  fMomentum = aParticle.GetMomentum();
142 
143  fData[ 5 ] = fMomentum.X();
144  fData[ 6 ] = fMomentum.Y();
145  fData[ 7 ] = fMomentum.Z();
146  }
147 
148  aParticle.RecalculateMagneticField();
149  aParticle.RecalculateSpinBody();
150 
151  if( GetAlignedSpin() != aParticle.GetAlignedSpin() )
152  {
153  fAlignedSpin = aParticle.GetAlignedSpin();
154 
155  fData[ 8 ] = fAlignedSpin;
156  }
157 
158  if( GetSpinAngle() != aParticle.GetSpinAngle() )
159  {
160  fData[ 9 ] = std::fmod( fSpinAngle, 2*KConst::Pi() );
161  }
162 
163  FixSpin();
164 
165  //trajmsg_debug( " time: <" << GetTime() << ">" << eom )
166  //trajmsg_debug( " length: <" << GetLength() << ">" << eom )
167  //trajmsg_debug( " position: <" << GetPosition().X() << ", " << GetPosition().Y() << ", " << GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom )
168  //trajmsg_debug( " momentum: <" << GetMomentum().X() << ", " << GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom )
169 
170  return;
171  }
172  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::PushTo( KSParticle& aParticle ) const
173  {
174  //trajmsg_debug( "AdiabaticSpin particle pushing to particle:" << eom )
175 
176 
177  aParticle.SetLength( GetLength() );
178  aParticle.SetPosition( GetPosition() );
179  aParticle.SetMomentum( GetMomentum() );
180  aParticle.SetTime( GetTime() );
181 
182  aParticle.SetAlignedSpin( GetAlignedSpin() );
183  aParticle.SetSpinAngle( std::fmod( GetSpinAngle(), 2*KConst::Pi() ) );
184 
185  if( fGetMagneticFieldPtr == &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing )
186  {
187  aParticle.SetMagneticField( GetMagneticField() );
188  }
189  if( fGetElectricFieldPtr == &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing )
190  {
191  aParticle.SetElectricField( GetElectricField() );
192  }
193  if( fGetMagneticGradientPtr == &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing )
194  {
195  aParticle.SetMagneticGradient( GetMagneticGradient() );
196  }
197  if( fGetElectricPotentialPtr == &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing )
198  {
199  aParticle.SetElectricPotential( GetElectricPotential() );
200  }
201 
202  aParticle.RecalculateSpinGlobal();
203 
204  //trajmsg_debug( " time: <" << GetTime() << ">" << eom )
205  //trajmsg_debug( " length: <" << GetLength() << ">" << eom )
206  //trajmsg_debug( " position: <" << GetPosition().X() << ", " << GetPosition().Y() << ", " << GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom )
207  //trajmsg_debug( " momentum: <" << GetMomentum().X() << ", " << GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom )
208 
209  return;
210  }
211

216  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::SetMagneticFieldCalculator( KSMagneticField* anMagneticField )
217  {
218  fMagneticFieldCalculator = anMagneticField;
219  return;
220  }
221  KSMagneticField* KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetMagneticFieldCalculator()
222  {
223  return fMagneticFieldCalculator;
224  }
225 
226  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::SetElectricFieldCalculator( KSElectricField* anElectricField )
227  {
228  fElectricFieldCalculator = anElectricField;
229  return;
230  }
231  KSElectricField* KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetElectricFieldCalculator()
232  {
233  return fElectricFieldCalculator;
234  }

266  {
267  return fSpinMagnitude;

270  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::SetGyromagneticRatio( const double& aGyromagneticRatio )
271  {
272  fGyromagneticRatio = aGyromagneticRatio;
273  return;
274  }
275  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetGyromagneticRatio()
276  {
277  return fGyromagneticRatio;
278  }
279 
280  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::FixSpin()
281  {
282  if ( fAlignedSpin > 0.99999 )
283  {
284  fData[ 8 ] = 0.99999;
285  fAlignedSpin = 0.99999;
286  }
287  if ( fAlignedSpin < -0.99999 )
288  {
289  fData[ 8 ] = -0.99999;
290  fAlignedSpin = -0.99999;
291  }
292  }
293

295  //dynamic variables
296  //*****************
297 
298  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetTime() const
299  {
300  fTime = fData[ 0 ];
301  return fTime;
302  }
303  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetLength() const
304  {
305  fLength = fData[ 1 ];
306  return fLength;
307  }
308  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetPosition() const
309  {
310  fPosition.SetComponents( fData[ 2 ], fData[ 3 ], fData[ 4 ] );
311  return fPosition;
312  }
313  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetMomentum() const
314  {
315  fMomentum.SetComponents( fData[ 5 ], fData[ 6 ], fData[ 7 ] );
316  return fMomentum;
317  }
318  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetVelocity() const
319  {
320  fVelocity = (1. / (GetMass() * GetLorentzFactor())) * GetMomentum();
321  return fVelocity;
322  }
323  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetLorentzFactor() const
324  {
325  fLorentzFactor = sqrt( 1. + GetMomentum().MagnitudeSquared() / (GetMass() * GetMass() * KConst::C() * KConst::C()) );
326  return fLorentzFactor;
327  }
328  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetKineticEnergy() const
329  {
330  fKineticEnergy = GetMomentum().MagnitudeSquared() / ((1. + GetLorentzFactor()) * fMass);
331  return fKineticEnergy;
332  }
333 
334  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetMagneticField() const
335  {
336  (this->*fGetMagneticFieldPtr)();
337  return fMagneticField;
338  }
339  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetElectricField() const
340  {
341  (this->*fGetElectricFieldPtr)();
342  return fElectricField;
343  }
344  const KThreeMatrix& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetMagneticGradient() const
345  {
346  (this->*fGetMagneticGradientPtr)();
347  return fMagneticGradient;
348  }
349  const KThreeMatrix& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetElectricGradient() const
350  {
351  (this->*fGetElectricGradientPtr)();
352  return fElectricGradient;
353  }
354  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetElectricPotential() const
355  {
356  (this->*fGetElectricPotentialPtr)();
357  return fElectricPotential;
358  }
359 
360  const KThreeVector& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetGuidingCenter() const
361  {
362  fGuidingCenter = GetPosition() + (1. / (GetCharge() * GetMagneticField().MagnitudeSquared())) * (GetMomentum().Cross( GetMagneticField() ));
363  return fGuidingCenter;
364  }
365  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetLongMomentum() const
366  {
367  fLongMomentum = GetMomentum().Dot( GetMagneticField().Unit() );
368  return fLongMomentum;
369  }
370  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetTransMomentum() const
371  {
372  fTransMomentum = (GetMomentum() - GetMomentum().Dot( GetMagneticField().Unit() ) * GetMagneticField().Unit()).Magnitude();
373  return fTransMomentum;
374  }
375  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetLongVelocity() const
376  {
377  fLongVelocity = GetLongMomentum() / (GetMass() * GetLorentzFactor());
378  return fLongVelocity;
379  }
380  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetTransVelocity() const
381  {
382  fTransVelocity = GetTransMomentum() / (GetMass() * GetLorentzFactor());
383  return fTransVelocity;
384  }
385  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetCyclotronFrequency() const
386  {
387  fCyclotronFrequency = (fabs( fCharge ) * GetMagneticField().Magnitude()) / (2. * KConst::Pi() * GetLorentzFactor() * GetMass());
388  return fCyclotronFrequency;
389  }
390  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetSpinPrecessionFrequency() const
391  {
392  fSpinPrecessionFrequency = std::abs( GetGyromagneticRatio() * GetMagneticField().Magnitude() );
393  return fSpinPrecessionFrequency;
394  }
395  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetOrbitalMagneticMoment() const
396  {
397  fOrbitalMagneticMoment = (GetTransMomentum() * GetTransMomentum()) / (2. * GetMagneticField().Magnitude() * GetMass());
398  return fOrbitalMagneticMoment;
399  }
400 
401  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetAlignedSpin() const
402  {
403  //FixSpin();
404  fAlignedSpin = fData[ 8 ];
405  return fAlignedSpin;
406  }
407  const double& KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::GetSpinAngle() const
408  {
409  //FixSpin();
410  fSpinAngle = fData[ 9 ];
411  return fSpinAngle;
412  }

417 
418  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing() const
419  {
420  return;
421  }
422  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticField() const
423  {
424  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateField( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fMagneticField );
425  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing;
426  return;
427  }
428  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricField() const
429  {
430  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculateField( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fElectricField );
431  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing;
432  return;
433  }
434  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient() const
435  {
436  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateGradient( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fMagneticGradient );
437  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing;
438  return;
439  }
440  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricGradient() const
441  {
442  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculateGradient( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fElectricGradient );
443  fGetElectricGradientPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing;
444  return;
445  }
446  void KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential() const
447  {
448  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculatePotential( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fElectricPotential );
449  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajAdiabaticSpinParticle::DoNothing;
450  return;
451  }
